member.name: T:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat.Any
member.summary: When passed to enable stream, librealsense will try to provide best suited format.

member.summary: 16-bit linear depth values. The depth is meters is equal to depth scale * pixel value.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat.Disparity16
member.summary: 16-bit linear disparity values. The depth in meters is equal to depth scale / pixel value.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat.Xyz32f
member.summary: 32-bit floating point 3D coordinates.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat.Yuyv
member.summary: Standard YUV pixel format as described in https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/YUV.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat.Rgb8
member.summary: 8-bit red, green and blue channels.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat.Bgr8
member.summary: 8-bit blue, green, and red channels -- suitable for OpenCV.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat.Rgba8
member.summary: 8-bit red, green and blue channels + constant alpha channel equal to FF.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat.Bgra8
member.summary: 8-bit blue, green, and red channels + constant alpha channel equal to FF.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat.Y8
member.summary: 8-bit per-pixel grayscale image.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat.Y16
member.summary: 16-bit per-pixel grayscale image.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat.Raw10
member.summary: Four 10-bit luminance values encoded into a 5-byte macropixel.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat.Raw16
member.summary: 16-bit raw image.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.PixelFormat.Raw8
member.summary: 8-bit raw image.

member.summary: Equivalent to Brown-Conrady distortion, except that tangential distortion is applied to radially distorted points.

member.summary: Equivalent to Brown-Conrady distortion, except undistorts image instead of distorting it.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Distortion.FTheta
member.summary: Distortion model of the fish-eye camera.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.DepthControlPreset.Default
member.summary: Default settings on chip. Similar to the medium setting and best for outdoors.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.DepthControlPreset.Off
member.summary: Disable almost all hardware-based outlier removal.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.DepthControlPreset.Low
member.summary: Provide a depthmap with a lower number of outliers removed, which has minimal false negatives.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.DepthControlPreset.Medium
member.summary: Provide a depthmap with a medium number of outliers removed, for a balanced approach.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.DepthControlPreset.Optimized
member.summary: Provide a depthmap with a medium to high number of outliers removed. Derived from an optimization function.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.DepthControlPreset.High
member.summary: Provide a depthmap with a higher number of outliers removed, which has minimal false positives.

member.name: T:RealSense.Net.Option
member.summary: Specifies general device configuration controls.
member.remarks: These can generally be mapped to camera UVC controls, and unless stated otherwise, can be set or queried at any time.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.ColorBacklightCompensation
member.summary: Enable/disable color backlight compensation.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.ColorBrightness
member.summary: Color image brightness.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.ColorContrast
member.summary: Color image contrast.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.ColorExposure
member.summary: Controls exposure time of color camera. Setting any value will disable auto exposure.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.ColorGain
member.summary: Color image gain.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.ColorGamma
member.summary: Color image gamma setting.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.ColorHue
member.summary: Color image hue.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.ColorSaturation
member.summary: Color image saturation setting.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.ColorSharpness
member.summary: Color image sharpness setting.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.ColorWhiteBalance
member.summary: Controls white balance of color image. Setting any value will disable auto white balance.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.ColorEnableAutoExposure
member.summary: Enable/disable color image auto-exposure.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.ColorEnableAutoWhiteBalance
member.summary: Enable/disable color image auto-white-balance.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.F200LaserPower
member.summary: Power of the F200/SR300 projector, with 0 meaning projector off.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.F200Accuracy
member.summary: Set the number of patterns projected per frame. The higher the accuracy value, the more patterns projected. Increasing the number of patterns helps to achieve better accuracy. Note that this control affects the depth FPS.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.F200MotionRange
member.summary: Motion vs. range trade-off, with lower values allowing for better motion sensitivity and higher values allowing for better depth range.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.F200FilterOption
member.summary: Set the filter to apply to each depth frame. Each one of the filters is optimized per the application requirements.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.F200ConfidenceThreshold
member.summary: Confidence level threshold used by the depth algorithm pipe to set whether a pixel will get a valid range or will be marked with invalid range.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.F200DynamicFps
member.summary: (F200-only) Allows to reduce FPS without restarting streaming. Valid values are {2, 5, 15, 30, 60}.

member.name: F:RealSense.Net.Option.Sr300AutoRangeEnableMotionVersusRange
member.summary: Configures SR300 depth auto-range setting. Should not be used directly but through the \c rsApplyIvcamPreset method in rsutil.h.

member.summary: Maximum depth in current depth units that will be output. Any values greater than Max Depth will be mapped to 0 during the conversion between disparity and depth. Set before streaming.

member.summary: Disparity scale factor used when in disparity output mode. Can only be set before streaming.

member.summary: {0 - 512}. Can only be set before streaming starts.
